name: Youth Development
description: They work to build youth assets and strengths that result in improved academic performance and lower-risk behaviors. They develop and implement prevention-focused programs and services that are targeted to at-risk communities and at-risk populations of youth. These programs and services are intended to promote the positive development of youth and to reduce and/or avoid the risky behaviors of youth. Programs and services are designed: - to promote healthy family interactions - to promote health
